title: Boris Johnson – 2022 Statement on His Personal Conduct in Attending a Party During Lockdown
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, in the House of Commons on 12 January 2022.
content:
I want to apologise. I know that millions of people across this country have made extraordinary sacrifices over the last 18 months.
